Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed Illinois Medical District
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Illinois Medical District due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Illinois Medical District due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
